name: Freemindfulness
description: A free web site to practice mindfulness guided exercises

name: Headspace
description: An app that only offers its content once you pay a membership. It is a convinient resourse that will guide you through easy meditation and mindfulness exercises

name: Calm
description: An app that offer limited free content and unlimited access to guided meditations and more when you become a memeber. The essentials is a free collection of content and tools designed to help you take care of your mental health.
